text: The Voyah Free is mid-size Luxury Crossover SUV made by Dongfeng under its premium brand Voyah since 2021. == History and Features == The Voyah Free was shown for the first time as the Voyah i-Free concept at the Beijing Auto Show in September 2020. the car was then officially launched in December. the production version was co-designed with Italdesign a famous italian design house. it has Dongfeng's Electric Smart Secure Architecture (ESSA) platform. and has these versions: A extended range model that has a 1.5-litre turbocharged engine and a 500 kW electric motor, giving it a total power of 671 hp. The engine has a thermal efficiency of 41.07%, with a peak power of 107 hp. The car can travel 860 km (530 miles). A all-electric version that has an 88 kWh battery, giving it a range of 500 km (310 miles) and a 4WD model has two electric motors, giving it 510 kW (684 hp). the electric version was discontinued in 2023 and only the 1.5 liter model was left. == Markets == The Voyah Free first launched in The Chinese Market and is also sold in European countries like Norway Denmark Spain Italy and etc and also in Israel and Russia and its sold in The United Arab Emirates (UAE) as the Rabdan One. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Voyah Free
